sentences.sentence: Amnesty International also draws attention to new laws to calm down protests, calling on governments to stop using excessive force and to control the trade in law enforcement equipment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Netanyahu said, From within national responsibility, from within the desire to prevent the people from being hurt, I decided to take the second and third reading of the law in this chamber of the Knesset, to give time to try to reach that broad scope, as soon as the investigation in the next Knesset takes place." The plan, which would give Netanyahu's government greater power to hands-pick judges, including those presiding over his corruption trial, has pitted liberal and secular Jewish Israelis against more right-wing and religiously conservative factions, even raising fears of a civil war, much to American alarm.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
